pre.intro: You enter yet another mysterious dungeon, god knows what awaits this time.
pre.lore: As you venture deeper you notice the air in this dungeon feels much stronger than the outside world. Suddenly you're assured by a mysterious voice that it is nothing to worry about...

green_saibaman.name: Green Saibaman
green_saibaman.dialogue: A human? Get ready to become fertilizer!
green_saibaman.success_dialogue: With a swift blow, the Saibaman is defeated. As you continue, a different enemy emerges from the shadows...
green_saibaman.failure_dialogue: The Saibaman explodes, taking you with it! You have been defeated.

blue_cell.name: Blue Cell
blue_cell.dialogue: Hehehe, you're not getting past me BLEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEH!
blue_cell.success_dialogue: You decided to ignore the Cell and it decided not to follow. But it seems there's someone much more powerful waiting.
blue_cell.failure_dialogue: The Cell Jr. jumps and absorbs you! You have been defeated.

raditz.name: Raditz
raditz.dialogue: A human? Kneel before the Saiyan Race! OH? Your power level is quite high..let's see if you can keep up! Raditz suddenly starts running around the room.
raditz.riddle_dialogue: A strange voice appears and says 'O' Young Shinobi, This foe isn't about your strength. It is about your minds, now answer carefully.'
raditz.question: What will you do?
raditz.failure_dialogue: Raditz outsmarts you by using his speed to confuse you and land a vital blow. You have been defeated.

choices.text: Try to keep up with Raditz

raditz_enraged.name: Angry Raditz
raditz_enraged.dialogue: IMPOSSIBLE! You stood your ground against my speed? Fine! Let's see how you handle this!

pre.intro: You step into the Forest of Death. The air feels heavy and creepy.
pre.lore: You spot something moving in the trees. It's Orochimaru, and he doesn't look happy to see you. Better be careful.

orochimaru.name: Orochimaru
orochimaru.dialogue: Well, well, look who wandered in. Think you can get out of here?
orochimaru.question: The forest is full of traps. Which way do you go?
orochimaru.riddle_dialogue: A whisper in the trees says, 'The path to true power lies where the shadows meet the sun.'

choices.failure_dialogue: You walk into a trap! Orochimaru's curse mark hurts you.
You find a cave, but it's full of snakes. Ouch!

choices.text: Follow the trail of ninja tools
choices.success_dialogue: You follow the tools and find the scroll. Suddenly, a big snake shows up!

mandarin_snake.name: Mandarin Snake
mandarin_snake.dialogue: SSSSSSS. I protect this scroll. You shall not pass!

pre.intro: The sky turns dark. Big metal rods crash down. Pain is here.
pre.lore: You stand in front of Pain, leader of the Akatsuki. His eyes are scary. This won't be easy.

pain.name: Pain
pain.dialogue: So, you came to fight me? Let's see what you've got.

pre.intro: You walk onto a battlefield. There are lots of ninja fighting everywhere.
pre.lore: Kabuto and Madara are here. You'll need to be smart to win.

kabuto_yakushi.name: Kabuto Yakushi
kabuto_yakushi.dialogue: I've got a whole army waiting for you. Ready to try your luck?

choices.failure_dialogue: There are too many! You get knocked out.

choices.success_dialogue: You dodge the crowd and hit Kabuto. But now Madara shows up!

madara_uchiha.name: Madara Uchiha
madara_uchiha.dialogue: Let's see if you can handle me.

pre.intro: You arrive at Arlong Park. The place looks tough.
pre.lore: The Arlong Pirates are making trouble. Time to help the town.

hatchan.name: Hatchan
hatchan.dialogue: You think you can beat me? I've got six swords!

choices.failure_dialogue: Six swords are too much. You lose.

choices.text: Trick him into breaking his swords
choices.success_dialogue: He falls for it and breaks his swords. Now Arlong steps up.

arlong.name: Arlong
arlong.dialogue: You beat Hatchan? I'm way stronger than him!

pre.intro: Shibuya is full of monsters tonight.
pre.lore: Curses and sorcerers are fighting everywhere. Stay sharp.

hanami.name: Hanami
hanami.dialogue: Humans ruin everything. I'm here to stop you.
hanami.dialogue_text: Hanami hates cities. Maybe you can use that.
hanami.question: What do you say?

choices.success_dialogue: Hanami gets mad, but you win!

choices.failure_dialogue: Hanami gets even stronger and beats you.

pre.intro: You find the Akatsuki hideout. It's raining and dark.
pre.lore: You need to sneak in and grab a scroll. Watch out for Itachi and Kisame.

kisame.name: Kisame
kisame.dialogue: A little fish in my pond? Let's see if you can swim.

choices.failure_dialogue: Kisame drains your chakra. You lose.

choices.text: Use fire jutsu to make steam
choices.success_dialogue: You blind Kisame and sneak past. Now Itachi is waiting.

itachi_uchiha.name: Itachi Uchiha
itachi_uchiha.dialogue: You got past Kisame. Let's see if you can handle my Sharingan.

pre.intro: You reach the Land of Waves. It's foggy and quiet.
pre.lore: You need to protect the bridge builder. Zabuza and Haku are here.

zabuza_momochi.name: Zabuza Momochi
zabuza_momochi.dialogue: You think you can stop me? Let's see you try.

choices.failure_dialogue: Zabuza traps you in water. You lose.

choices.success_dialogue: You confuse Zabuza and he runs away. Haku steps up.

haku.name: Haku
haku.dialogue: Sorry, but I can't let you pass.

pre.intro: It's time for the Chunin Exams. The arena is packed.
pre.lore: You're up against some strong genin. Good luck!

rock_lee.name: Rock Lee
rock_lee.dialogue: I want to show everyone that hard work pays off. Let's fight!

choices.text: Use a jutsu from far away
choices.failure_dialogue: Rock Lee dodges and knocks you out.

choices.success_dialogue: You keep up with Lee. He uses his last move and collapses.

gaara.name: Gaara
gaara.dialogue: I'm the sand monster. Get ready.

pre.intro: The Titans break through the wall. People are running everywhere.
pre.lore: You need to help the Survey Corps and save the city.

choices.success_dialogue: You hit the nape and the Titan falls.

choices.failure_dialogue: The Titan ignores you and bites you.

armin_arlert.name: Armin Arlert
armin_arlert.dialogue: We need to get to the cannon! Help me out!
armin_arlert.dialogue_text: Armin is freaking out. Calm him down and make a plan.
armin_arlert.question: What do you say?

choices.failure_dialogue: Armin panics and you get left behind.

choices.text: Let's focus and make a plan.
choices.success_dialogue: You calm Armin down and he helps you win.

pre.intro: You board the Mugen Train. Something feels off.
pre.lore: Rengoku is with you. There's a demon hiding somewhere.

enmu_lower_one.name: Enmu
enmu_lower_one.puzzle_dialogue: You're stuck in a dream. How do you wake up?
enmu_lower_one.question: What do you use?
enmu_lower_one.failure_dialogue: You try the sword, but it's just a dream. You're stuck.
enmu_lower_one.success_dialogue: You use the knife and wake up, ready to fight!

akaza_upper_three.name: Akaza
akaza_upper_three.dialogue: Rengoku! You and your friend should become demons and fight me forever!

pre.intro: You enter Heavens Arena. It's huge and full of fighters.
pre.lore: You're on the 200th floor. Time to show what you can do.

hisoka.name: Hisoka
hisoka.dialogue: You look interesting. Want to fight?
hisoka.dialogue_text: Hisoka wants a good fight. What do you say?
hisoka.question: Your answer?

choices.text: I'm not ready, maybe next time.
choices.success_dialogue: Hisoka laughs and lets you go.

gon_and_killua.name: Gon and Killua
gon_and_killua.dialogue: We're here to test our strength. Let's fight!

pre.intro: You arrive at the Kage Summit. All the leaders are here.
pre.lore: Sasuke crashes the meeting. You need to fight your way through.

choices.text: Try to talk your way past

choices.success_dialogue: You beat the guards. Sasuke is waiting.

sasuke_uchiha.name: Sasuke Uchiha
sasuke_uchiha.dialogue: I'm not here to play. Move.

pre.intro: You find the Uchiha Hideout. It's dark and quiet.
pre.lore: Madara is here somewhere. Get ready.

madara_uchiha_final.name: Madara Uchiha
madara_uchiha_final.dialogue: So, you want to fight me? Let's see what you've got.

pre.intro: The ground shakes. The Ten-Tails is here.
pre.lore: Obito is trying to cast a big jutsu. You need to stop him.

obito_uchiha.name: Obito Uchiha
obito_uchiha.dialogue: This is it. The world will change.

choices.text: Talk to him and try to change his mind
choices.success_dialogue: Obito hesitates. You get your chance.

choices.failure_dialogue: Obito dodges and traps you in a genjutsu.

madara_reanimated.name: Reanimated Madara
madara_reanimated.dialogue: Let's see if you can handle me.
